text:
@drdavidsamadi Hold on, hold on 

I thought Covid-19 was a biological weapon designed to crater Trump's chances for reelection.

Are you saying it's not?

I thought it was supposed to vanish when warm summer comes. Is that not true?

As a proctologist, are you versed in epidemiology?
